item.title: PNPT Review 2024
item.description: I recently passed the PNPT exam and in this article I will share my views on the exam, course material and if you should take it or not.

item.title: eWPTv2 Review 2023
item.description: I recently passed the eWPTv2 exam that was released in October this year. This was an enhanced version of the v1 exam which included some old & obsolete topics, mostly not relevant in todayâ€™s scenario. In this article I will share my views on the exam, course material and if you should take it or not.
